memorycardtype: Compact Flash (Type I), SD / SDHC / SDXC UHS-I compliant
lenstype: Nikon F mount (with AF coupling and AF contacts)
autofocus: Yes, Phase Detect, Multi-Area, Selective Single Point, Tracking, Single, Continuous, Face Detection, Live View
whitebalancing: Custom White Balance (5), White Balance Presets (12), Auto, Incandescent, Fluorescent, Direct Sunlight, Flash, Cloudy, Shade, Preset Manual can be stored), Color Temperature (2500 K 10000 K), All with Fine-tuning
powersupply: EH-5b AC Adapter, Requires EP-5B Power Connector
imageformat: NEF (RAW), JPEG, NEF (RAW) JPEG, DCF 2.0, DPOF, EXIF 2.3 ( Fine, Normal & Basic Quality )
otherfocusfeatures: Focal Length Multiplier (1x), No. of Focus Points (51)
externalflash: Yes, Hot-shoe, Wireless plus sync connector
dustreduction: Yes, Image sensor cleaning, Image Dust Off reference data (requires optional Capture NX 2 software)
flashmodes: Auto, On, Off, Red-eye, Slow sync, Rear curtain, High-speed sync
builtinflash: Yes, Manual pop-up with button release and a Guide Number of 12/39, 12/39 with manual flash (m/ft, ISO 100, 20 C/68 F)
display: 3.2 inch TFT Color LCD with 170 degrees wide-viewing angle
